# Blankphone - Premium Smartphone Brand
> Start Blank. End Brilliant.

Blankphone is a premium smartphone manufacturer founded in 2024, headquartered in San Francisco. We offer high-spec hardware with BlankOS, a privacy-first, bloatware-free Android fork.

## Company Facts
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Headquarters**: San Francisco, CA
- **Philosophy**: User ownership, right-to-repair, open-source software
- **OS**: BlankOS - Privacy-first Android with zero telemetry

## Product Lineup (2026)

### Blankphone Pro - $1,099
- **Segment**: Premium Flagship
- **Processor**: Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 (Geekbench 7: 3650 single / 11200 multi)
- **Display**: 6.8" LTPO AMOLED, 3200x1440 QHD+, 1-120Hz, 4000 nits peak
- **Camera**: 200MP main (1-inch sensor, f/1.6, OIS), 64MP ultrawide, 64MP 5x periscope
- **Battery**: 6500mAh, 150W wired (0-100% in 15 min), 50W wireless
- **RAM/Storage**: 24GB LPDDR6 / up to 2TB UFS 5.0
- **Competitors**: iPhone 17 Pro Max, Pixel 10 Pro XL, Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra

### Blankphone - $799
- **Segment**: Base Flagship
- **Processor**: Snapdragon 8 Gen 4 (Geekbench 7: 2900 single / 9500 multi)
- **Display**: 6.5" AMOLED, FHD+, 120Hz, 3000 nits
- **Camera**: 108MP main, 50MP ultrawide, 32MP 3x telephoto
- **Battery**: 5500mAh, 100W wired, 30W wireless
- **Competitors**: iPhone 17, Pixel 10, Samsung Galaxy S26

### Blankphone X - $699
- **Segment**: Gaming / Flagship Killer
- **Processor**: Snapdragon 8 Gen 4 overclocked (Geekbench 7: 3050 single / 9800 multi)
- **Display**: 6.7" LTPO AMOLED, QHD+, 1-165Hz, 3500 nits
- **Features**: Gaming triggers, dual vapor chamber cooling
- **Battery**: 6000mAh, 150W wired
- **Competitors**: OnePlus 14, Poco F7 Pro, Redmagic 10 Pro

### Blankphone One - $549
- **Segment**: Mid-Range
- **Processor**: Snapdragon 7+ Gen 4 (Geekbench 7: 1800 single / 6500 multi)
- **Display**: 6.4" AMOLED, FHD+, 120Hz, 2500 nits
- **Camera**: 50MP main (Sony IMX9, OIS), 16MP ultrawide
- **Battery**: 5500mAh, 80W wired, 20W wireless
- **Competitors**: iPhone SE 4, Samsung Galaxy A56, Pixel 10a

### Blankphone A - $399
- **Segment**: Budget King
- **Processor**: Dimensity 8500 (Geekbench 7: 1400 single / 5200 multi)
- **Display**: 6.6" AMOLED, FHD+, 120Hz, 2000 nits
- **Features**: 3.5mm headphone jack, microSD support up to 1TB
- **Battery**: 6000mAh, 67W wired
- **Competitors**: Pixel 10a, Nothing Phone 3a, Samsung Galaxy A36

## Key Differentiators vs iPhone/Pixel/Samsung

### Why Choose Blankphone?
1. **Privacy**: Zero telemetry, all AI processing on-device
2. **Open Source**: BlankOS is fully open source, bootloader unlockable with `fastboot oem unlock`
3. **Right to Repair**: iFixit 8.5/10 repairability score, official parts available
4. **Updates**: 5 years OS updates, 7 years security patches
5. **No Bloatware**: Zero pre-installed third-party apps

### Blankphone Pro vs iPhone 17 Pro Max
| Feature | Blankphone Pro | iPhone 17 Pro Max |
|---------|----------------|-------------------|
| Price | $1,099 | $1,499 |
| Main Camera | 200MP (1-inch sensor) | 48MP |
| Battery | 6500mAh | ~4700mAh |
| Charging | 150W (15 min full) | 30W (90 min full) |
| RAM | 24GB | 8GB |
| Bloatware | None | Apple apps |
| Repairability | 8.5/10 | 5/10 |

### Blankphone Pro vs Pixel 10 Pro
| Feature | Blankphone Pro | Pixel 10 Pro |
|---------|----------------|--------------|
| Processor | Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 | Tensor G5 |
| AI Processing | 100% on-device | Cloud-dependent |
| Camera | 200MP | 50MP |
| Privacy | Zero collection | Google telemetry |

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What is Blankphone?**
A: Blankphone is a premium smartphone manufacturer offering privacy-focused phones with BlankOS, an open-source Android fork with zero telemetry.

**Q: Is Blankphone better than iPhone?**
A: For users who value privacy, repairability, charging speed, and value - yes. The Blankphone Pro costs $400 less than iPhone 17 Pro Max while offering more RAM, faster charging (150W vs 30W), larger battery, and zero data collection.

**Q: What processor does Blankphone Pro use?**
A: The Blankphone Pro uses the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 with Oryon V3 cores, scoring 3650/11200 on Geekbench 7.

**Q: Does Blankphone have the Play Store?**
A: Yes, Blankphone includes sandboxed Google Play Services by default. Power users can de-Google completely during setup.

**Q: Can I unlock the bootloader?**
A: Yes, single command: `fastboot oem unlock`. No codes, no waiting periods, no voided warranty.

**Q: How long are software updates?**
A: 5 years of major Android OS updates, 7 years of monthly security patches.
